aka: Japan: A Story of Love and Hate

director.name: 肖恩·麦卡利斯特 Sean McAllister

this_title: Japan: A Story of Love and Hate
trans_title: Japan: A Story of Love and Hate
introduction: An international co-production depicting the woes and aspirations of Japan’s working poor, set in Yamagata and directed by an Englishman. Through charming and sincere revelations about his own life, he asks simple questions about Japan’s dark realities as an industrial power as he builds on friendships and changes relationships.
